sent.orig: As a consultant the word client is synonymous with the word customer.
sent.trans: 在“顾问”这个方面，client和customer（顾客）是同义词。

sent.orig: Other data elements, such as the item purchased and the purchase quantity, are generated by CUSTOMER.
sent.trans: 另外一些数据，例如购买的货物品种和数量由customer产生。

sent.orig: Customer Policy: Most items are in stock and are out within 1-3 days via FedEx ground.
sent.trans: Customer政策：多数项目是在股票和被运出1-3天之内通过联邦快递地面。

sent.orig: In customer relation management, they should segment customer to customer's value and build customer database systematically.
sent.trans: 在客户的开发和维护管理战略上，要根据客户价值细分客户和建立系统的客户数据库。

sent.orig: Also help customer to make tooling and products, offer customer satisfied products base on customer's request.
sent.trans: 有丰富的经验根据不同客户的需要提供模具制作，射出成型，组装等一条龙服务。
